name: Custom Converter
helpText: The main responsibility of a converter is to convert from one form to another. The purpose of this converter is to support any type of transformation required, implemented by a bespoke converter class.
_ikasanComponentFactoryMethod: The custom converter is a user implemented class so has no factory as such

componentName.helpText: The name of the component as displayed on diagrams, space are encouraged, succinct is best. The name should be unique for the flow.

description.helpText: A more detailed description of the component that may assist in support .

beskpokeClassName.helpText: The name of the class that contain the custom conversion.

fromClass.helpText: The type of data we expect to come into the converter.

toClass.helpText: The type of data we expect to be the output of the the converter.
